Posts.Content:
On June 10, had spot compression and ultrasound. Today is June 23 and no word on results.
Guess there can't be any problems or I would have heard something by now.
Posts.Title: Special Views after Mammogram

Posts.Content: Today is July 31 had spot compression and ultrasound on June 10. The doctor told me prior to June 10 that she would phone the results as she didn't want patients to worry and they could get on with their life. Have not heard anything so I am going to assume everything is fine.
Posts.Title: Special Views after Mammogram

Posts.Content:
I had a mammogram in early February and have had to wait a month for special views and an ultrasound.  The reason they gave me was a clarity issue and unclear image of breast.  They told me this was common as I had not had a previous mammogram for comparison.  I have been worried sick, can't sleep, thinking the worst.  Is this common or something to be concerned about
. They also told me 80% of women referred for further testing end up being ok.  Also went on to say that only 1  out of 10 have cancer after further testing.
Posts.Title: Special Views after Mammogram

Posts.Content:
Thanks, it is easier said that done not to worry and constantly think about
 it.  The numbers that were given to me are from the Breast Screening Clinic and the technician that did the mammogram.  She told me it was a problem with clarity issue with mammogram and the fact that I had not had previous mammogram.  Worrying doesn't do any good but you always think the worst.
Posts.Title: Special Views after Mammogram

Posts.Content: Today is June 25 and have not heard anything.
Posts.Title: Special Views after Mammogram

Posts.Content: Thanks so much for the words of encouragement.  I will definitely keep you posted.  Thanks again.
Posts.Title: Special Views after Mammogram

Posts.Content: Today is Monday July 7, 2014, still no word from cone magnification and ultrasound done on June 10, 2014.I would assume at this point everything is ok.
Posts.Title: Special Views after Mammogram
